item.title: Weather: Display the current weather in the sidebar.
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_weather
WeatherDisplay the current weather in the sidebar.

item.title: Authors login: Show a login form for authors
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_loginform
Authors loginShow a login form for authors

item.title: Amazon Recommendations: Recommend Products at Amazon within the Amazon-Partnerprogram
item.author: Thomas Nesges
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_amazon
Amazon RecommendationsRecommend Products at Amazon within the Amazon-Partnerprogram

item.title: Last Google Search: Shows the last Google Search which led to this Blog
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_google_last_query
Last Google SearchShows the last Google Search which led to this Blog

item.title: Hitmaps: Shows where the blogs visitors are coming from
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_hitmaps
HitmapsShows where the blogs visitors are coming from

item.title: Wikipedia Finder: Ein Markiertes Wort in Wikipedia suchen
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_wikipedia_finder
Wikipedia FinderEin Markiertes Wort in Wikipedia suchen

item.title: Show tagged entries: Shows a list of existing tags for entries
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_freetag
Show tagged entriesShows a list of existing tags for entries

item.title: Popular Entries: Shows the titles and number of comments of the most popular entries calculated according to the entries most commented on.
item.author: Kaustubh Srikanth
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_popularentries
Popular EntriesShows the titles and number of comments of the most popular entries calculated according to the entries most commented on.

item.title: category tree menu: DHTML category menu. Requires PEAR::HTML_TreeMenu.
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_category_dhtml_menu
category tree menuDHTML category menu. Requires PEAR::HTML_TreeMenu.

item.title: Photoblog Entries: Shows the thumbnails of the most recent photoblog entries.
item.author: Serendipity Team
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_photoblog
Photoblog EntriesShows the thumbnails of the most recent photoblog entries.

item.title: User Self-Registration: Allows blog visitors to create their own author account. WARNING: With this plugin ANY visotor will be able to login into your blog and create entries! Though administrative functions are not accessible by them.
item.author: Garvin Hicking
item.content:encoded:
serendipity_plugin_adduser
User Self-RegistrationAllows blog visitors to create their own author account. WARNING: With this plugin ANY visotor will be able to login into your blog and create entries! Though administrative functions are not accessible by them.
